dialogues.name: Tommy
dialogues.dialogueText: The castle ruin is just miles away!

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: Slow down kiddo. Forget about why we are here?

dialogues.name: Ally
dialogues.dialogueText: Monsters keep showing up from the ruin.

dialogues.name: Ally
dialogues.dialogueText: And we were paid to clean them up.

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: Right. It’s been hundreds of years since ...

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: ...the Legend Hero Genki Knight fought against the Corrupted King.

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: Guess things must have been changed a lot.

dialogues.name: Tommy
dialogues.dialogueText: Can you tell me more about our hero?

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: Of course! But before entering the ruin. Safety first.

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: Let’s review what I have taught.

dialogues.name: Tommy
dialogues.dialogueText: All right, LEFT JOYSTICK or WSAD to move.

dialogues.name: Ally
dialogues.dialogueText: RIGHT JOYSTICK or MOUSE to shoot monsters!

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: And don’t forget about magic items. TOUCH them to use.

dialogues.name: Tommy
dialogues.dialogueText: Ok, we’ve done too much talk. Let’s head to the castle!

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: (I can still remember how my master talked about our hero ...

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: ... back when I was a kid)

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: (kiddo was just like him on that day)
